data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Sapporo throw-in in Kashima's half.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
Kashima takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 4, Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Sapporo.
Hiroyuki Kimura has awarded Kashima a corner.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Kashima at Sapporo.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Sapporo just outside Kashima's area.
Sapporo's Yoshiaki Komai misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 10, Hiroyuki Kimura awards Kashima a goal kick.
Sapporo drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 14, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
In the minute 15, In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in Kashima.
Kashima are pushing forward but Ryotaro Araki's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 17, Goal kick for Sapporo at Sapporo.
Kashima needs to be cautious. Sapporo have an attacking throw-in.
Sapporo have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Sapporo takes a corner from the right.
Kim Min-Tae's header is off-target for Sapporo.
In the minute 20, Kashima have a goal kick.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 24, Play has been interrupted briefly in Sapporo to check on Kojiro Nakano, who is grimacing with pain.
Kojiro Nakano for Sapporo is back on the field again.
Sapporo to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
In the minute 27, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Sapporo throw-in in Kashima's half.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the away team a throw-in.
Kashima are coming forward and Everaldo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 28, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sapporo.
Juan Alano (Kashima) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal kick for Sapporo at Sapporo.
In the minute 30, Throw-in high up the field for Kashima in Sapporo.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 32, Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sapporo's half?
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Sapporo.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 34, Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sapporo's half?
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 35, Daiki Suga of Sapporo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Kashima drive upfield and Juan Alano gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sapporo defender.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a throw-in for Kashima, close to Sapporo's area.
Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Kashima in the half of Sapporo.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
Throw-in for Sapporo at Sapporo.
In the minute 41, Goal! Yoshiaki Komai gives Sapporo a 1-0 lead in Sapporo.
Great play from Akito Fukumori to set up the goal.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 42, Ball safe as Sapporo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 45, Kashima to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick Kashima.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Kim Min-Tae for Sapporo has been booked by Hiroyuki Kimura and receives a first yellow card.
Hiroyuki Kimura has blown to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Kashima close to the penalty box.
Kashima are pushing forward but Tomoya Inukai's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sapporo.
In the minute 48, Hiroyuki Kimura waits before resuming play because Kim Min-Tae for Sapporo is still down.
In the minute 49, Kim Min-Tae is back on his feet again.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Kashima throw-in in Sapporo's half.
In Sapporo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 51, Can Sapporo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashima's half?
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Sapporo.
Throw-in for Kashima close to the penalty box.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Sapporo a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Throw-in Sapporo.
Sapporo's Takuma Arano misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Kashima at Sapporo.
In the minute 56, Important block from the Kashima defence as Takuro Kaneko fires in a strike for Sapporo.
Sapporo make their first substitution with Anderson Lopes replacing Takuro Kaneko.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
In the minute 57, Sapporo surge into the attack at Sapporo but Shunta Tanaka’s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sapporo.
Sapporo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 58, Can Kashima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sapporo's half?
Kashima's Juan Alano gets in a shot on goal at Sapporo. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Kashima at Sapporo.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yuta Matsumura is on a sub for Juan Alano for Kashima.
Ryota Nagaki is replacing Kei Koizumi for the away team.
In the minute 60, Zago (Kashima) is making a third substitution, with Ayase Ueda replacing Ryotaro Araki.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 61, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Sapporo throw-in in Kashima's half.
Kashima have a goal kick.
Anderson Lopes (Sapporo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 63, Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
Kashima's Kento Misao is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 64, Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sapporo in the half of Kashima.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a throw-in for Sapporo, close to Kashima's area.
In the minute 66, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kashima.
Throw-in high up the field for Kashima in Sapporo.
Sapporo needs to be cautious. Kashima have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 69, The away team replace Shoma Doi with Itsuki Someno.
Takuma Arano for Sapporo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Kashima a goal kick.
In the minute 70, The match at Sapporo has been interrupted briefly for a check on Yuya Oki, who is down injured.
Yuya Oki is back on the pitch.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 73, Sapporo have a goal kick.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 76, The home team have replaced Tomoki Takamine with Douglas. This is the second substitution made today by Michael Petrovic.
Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Zago is making the team's fifth substitution at Sapporo with Ryuji Izumi replacing Daiki Sugioka.
In the minute 78, Takuma Arano of Sapporo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
Sapporo have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 81, Anderson Lopes gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sapporo.
Ball safe as Sapporo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Kashima.
In the minute 83, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Sapporo throw-in in Kashima's half.
Sapporo's Anderson Lopes has run offside.
Kashima are coming forward and Ayase Ueda gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a throw-in for Kashima, close to Sapporo's area.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Kosuke Shirai is replacing Daiki Suga for Sapporo at Sapporo.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
In the minute 88, Throw-in Sapporo.
Can Kashima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sapporo's half?
Throw-in for Kashima close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sapporo.
At Sapporo the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Kashima in the half of Sapporo.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Sapporo a goal kick.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Douglas of Sapporo is pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Sapporo in the half of Kashima.
Sapporo's Douglas is whistled for offside at Sapporo.
Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
Throw-in for Sapporo at Sapporo.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
